content: you ll have your pick of the litter in this corner-to-corner dog blanket pattern designed to include a wide variety of popular breeds you ll get the chance to crochet yourself a whole pack of playful c2c crochet pups this project uses traditional corner-to-corner crochet techniques and throws in a few creative curve balls hello c2c popcorn stitches to make a show-stopping blanket included dog breeds can be easily customized with your choice of colors - doodle ex goldendoodle labradoodle aussiedoodle bernadoodle - french bulldog / boston terrier - golden retriever / labrador retriever - chihuahua - border collie / australian shepard - havanese - pit bull / bulldog - poodle - husky detailed 64 page pdf includes - 9 c2c crochet dog graph patterns - written line-by-line instructions to accompany each graph pattern - optional paw print border pattern to create a rectangular blanket - explanation of how to block blanket join squares and add a border - links to relevant photo and video tutorials - formatted to print easily the best in show c2c dog blanket is endlessly customizable try a blanket with one breed in nine different colors crochet a graphic throw with different background colors for each pup or simply crochet one square to create a pillow cover with a portrait of your favorite pet yarn - all yarn colors pictured are listed in sources in the pattern but any washable worsted weight yarn can be substituted use up stash yarn or have fun sourcing your favorite fur colors this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew sizing/measurements - finished blanket measures approximately 58 x 58 each dog block measures approximately 18 x 18 see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing downloading - this listing is for the best in show c2c blanket crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items -
